Mixed trading day 
2019-11-14
The Shanghai Composite Index lost 0.33 percent to 2,905.24 points yesterday, while the Shenzhen Component Index added 0.18 percent to 9,687.85 points. The blue-chip CSI300 index shed 0.1 percent to 3,899.98 points. Turnover on the two major bourses totaled 359.3 billion yuan (US$51.13billion), down from 365.5 billion yuan on Tuesday. Securities and insurance shares were the biggest losers. On the STAR Market, most shares gained and only 3 posted declines. DBAPPSecurity, a company focused on cybersecurity products, soared by 13.76 percent.
